title: Develop Terraform Module for ACR with Private Link
description: Create reusable Terraform module for Azure Container Registry, ensuring admin user is disabled and networking is restricted via Private Link.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: ACR resource created successfully; Public network access disabled; Private Endpoint configured
definition_of_done: Module applied in dev environment; Terraform state locked; Documentation updated

title: Terraform Module for PostgreSQL with PostGIS
description: Provision Azure Database for PostgreSQL Flexible Server, enable PostGIS extension, and configure firewall rules/VNet integration.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Postgres instance active; PostGIS extension enabled; Connection possible from VNet
definition_of_done: Connection verification successful; Backup policy configured

title: Terraform Module for Azure Blob Storage & Redis
description: Provision Storage Account with containers for invoices/media (Private access) and Azure Cache for Redis.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Storage account created with encryption; Redis instance running; Access keys in Key Vault
business_value: Support for caching and file uploads

title: Develop Terraform Module for AKS with CNI and RBAC
description: Provision Azure Kubernetes Service using Azure CNI networking, enabling RBAC integration with Azure AD, and configuring system node pools.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: AKS Cluster running with Azure CNI; AD integration verified; Kubectl access working

title: Configure GitHub Actions Workflow for Backend
description: Create .yml workflow to trigger on PRs, run `npm ci`, `npm run lint`, `npm test`, and build Docker container.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Workflow triggers on PR; Fails on lint/test errors; Docker build succeeds
definition_of_done: Pipeline running successfully on test repo

title: Configure Repository Branch Protection Rules
description: Set up GitHub branch protection to require status checks (CI passing) before merging to main.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Main branch protected; Merging blocked until CI passes; Code owner review required

title: Configure Azure AD B2C User Flows & Claims
description: Configure the B2C tenant. Create User Flows for Sign Up/Sign In. Define custom attributes for 'Role' and ensure it appears in the JWT.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Sign up flow works with MFA; JWT token contains 'extension_Role' claim
definition_of_done: JWT verified in jwt.ms; Documentation created
deployment_notes: Requires Global Admin for initial setup

title: Implement NestJS Passport JWT Strategy
description: Implement the `JwtStrategy` using `passport-jwt` to validate the B2C token signature using the JWKS endpoint.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Validates RS256 signature against B2C keys; Rejects expired tokens; Extracts user payload

title: Implement RBAC Guard and Decorators
description: Create a custom `@Roles()` decorator and a `RolesGuard` that checks the user's role from the JWT against the required roles.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Guard allows access if roles match; Guard throws 403 if roles mismatch

title: Setup Next.js Layout and Auth Guard
description: Create dashboard layout with sidebar. Implement `AuthGuard` using MSAL for Next.js to protect admin routes.
sprint_goal: Establish Secure Cloud Infrastructure & CI/CD Pipeline
acceptance_criteria: Layout responsive; Redirects to login if unauth; Sidebar navigation works
definition_of_done: Base layout committed; Auth redirect verifying against B2C

title: Design and Implement Product/Warranty Database Schema
description: Create TypeORM entities for Product and Warranty. Create migration script. Ensure indexing on serial numbers.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Entities created with proper relations; Migration runs successfully; Indexes applied
definition_of_done: Migration applied to dev DB; Schema diagram updated

title: Implement Warranty Calculation Logic and Product API
description: Implement `POST /products`. Use `date-fns` to calculate expiry date (Purchase + Duration - 1). Validate inputs (future dates, duplicates).
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Products saved with correct expiry; Future dates rejected; Duplicate serials rejected

title: Unit Tests for Warranty Calculation
description: Write unit tests specifically for the date calculation logic, covering leap years and month boundaries.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Leap year cases pass; End-of-month cases pass; 100% coverage for calc utility
definition_of_done: Tests committed and passing in CI

title: Implement Azure Blob Storage Service
description: Create a NestJS service wrapping `@azure/storage-blob` to upload files and generate SAS tokens for retrieval.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Uploads file to private container; Generates valid read-only SAS token; Handles errors gracefully

title: Implement File Upload Controller with Validation
description: Create API endpoint using `FileInterceptor`. Validate MIME type (pdf/jpg/png) and size (max 10MB). Call Storage Service.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Rejects exe/zip files; Rejects files > 10MB; Returns file URL on success

title: Implement Service Center Polygon Schema and Query
description: Define schema for Service Center polygons. Write PostGIS query to find centers containing a user point.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Polygon data can be inserted; Query returns correct centers for a point; Spatial index active
definition_of_done: Queries verified against test data; Latency benchmarks met

title: Implement Round-Robin Assignment Logic
description: Implement service to handle ties (multiple centers covering one location). Use Redis to store last-assigned index per zone.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Rotates through eligible centers; State persists in Redis; Handles Redis failures gracefully
definition_of_done: Service implemented; Load test verifies distribution

title: Develop Warranty Card UI Component
description: Create React Native component displaying product details and dynamic status badge (Green/Amber/Red). Ensure accessibility labels.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Matches design mockup; Badge color changes based on props; VoiceOver reads status
definition_of_done: Component created and tested on simulator

title: Integrate Warranty API in Mobile App
description: Implement data fetching logic (React Query) to call `GET /products` and feed data to Warranty Card components.
sprint_goal: Core Business Logic: Products, Docs, & Geospatial
acceptance_criteria: Data loads on screen open; Loading state handled; Error state handled

title: Setup WatermelonDB Schema and Models
description: Configure WatermelonDB. Define schemas for Product and Warranty. Set up database provider.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Database initializes; Schema matches backend; Basic CRUD works

title: Implement Sync Service (Pull)
description: Implement synchronization logic to pull changes from backend and update local WatermelonDB using `synchronize()`.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Pulls new data; Updates local records; Handles errors silently

title: Implement Queue for Offline Actions
description: Create a queue system to store write actions (like Register Product) when offline.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Actions stored when offline; Replayed when online; Persists on restart

title: Configure Background Location Native Modules
description: Install and configure `react-native-background-geolocation`. Configure Android Manifest (Foreground Service) and iOS Info.plist.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Permissions requested correctly; Background mode enabled; Build succeeds
definition_of_done: App tracks location in background on device

title: Implement Location WebSocket Client
description: Create logic to stream coordinates to backend WebSocket when 'Travel Mode' is active.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Connects to WSS; Sends coords every 30s; Reconnects on drop

title: Implement Analytics Charts with Recharts
description: Develop `AnalyticsWidget` component. Fetch data from API. Render Line/Bar charts for fault patterns.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Charts render data correctly; Tooltips working; Loading states handled

title: Integrate Mapbox for Geographic View
description: Implement `MapWidget` using `react-map-gl`. Render markers for service requests. Handle API key env vars.
sprint_goal: Advanced Mobile Features & Analytics
acceptance_criteria: Map loads centered; Markers appear; Zoom/Pan works
